Desc.entry: A private residential care home providing resdential and specialised Elderly Mentally Infirm (EMI) care services. 60 beds with 3 EMI wings and 1 residential wing. Run by Ideal Care Homes. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
